modName: She Must Work Out (SMWO) Body Replacer
summary: Body Replacer made with BodySlide for UUNP - for use as a body replacer in game and for converting armours. UUNP preset files are also available.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ff00][size=4][b]She Must Work Out (SMWO) Presets based on my [i]personal[/i] body replacer
[/b][/size][/color]
Is an "athletic" styled physique shaped in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide[/url] (UUNP) for use as a body replacer and modders resource for converting/making armour.
Having spent years around athletic types whilst surfing, snowboarding, and working in the fashion industry, I figured I liked this shape. A lot! So I based this body on people I know personally, or have seen.

I first used CBBE back in the day, then moved to UNP, then Sevenbase. But I always knew there had to be a sweet spot, i.e. something I liked. All 3 had features I liked, and aspects I didn't. So...3 months ago I started to tinker and dabble, use old photos, my memory of shapes I've seen (mostly female surfing friends in wetsuits), etc. In short, SMWO was born from a "blank" (all zeroed sliders) in BodySlide, and step by step I shaped, tested, and re-shaped until you see what's on offer here. SMWO v1.0, a.k.a. "Petite" was the first to roll out. This shape was based more on a couple friends who're very petite (though one has enhanced breasts...perfect for the max weight). But, after seeing a screenshot from a user, and a comment from someone in the posts section, I decided to re-assess v1.0 and bring it more in line with a "standard" athletic form. V2.0 was born. Thicker set around the waist/hips/thighs, and bustier - but still in believable proportions to the body. For minimum weight think "surfer/snowboarder", for max weight think "health and fitness" model. SMWO is merely a projection of my observations and what I love best about the female form...it's quite literally moving art. And in there lies the beauty of what a woman truly is; graceful, elegant, and mesmerising. If only they knew. I think some do...but shhh!

If you're familiar with my work (NO McFluffin around here!): you'll know there are two versions in multiple flavours.

[color=#00ffff]V1.0[/color] - is my first shape and is really the "petite" athletic type. 
[color=#00ffff]V2.0[/color] - has a more shapely waist and slightly bigger bust. It's still smaller around the waist/hips than UNP at min/max weight, but has more shapely legs, arms, and broader shoulders (like a swimmer). 

[color=#00ffff][size=4]The Flavours of SMWO[/size][/color]

The .xmls contain both versions in the following flavours: 

[color=#00ffff]SMWO HDT  [/color]-[color=#00ffff] [/color]For gameplay, nude standard shape
[color=#00ffff]SMWO Special  [/color]- For gameplay and geared towards use with SexLab (includes HDT Hands)
[color=#00ffff]SMWO NN HDT[/color] - Non-Nude with HDT
[color=#00ffff]SMWO NN NBJB[/color] - Non-Nude with No Bouncy Jiggly Bits (no HDT)
[color=#00ffff]SMWO Cleavage HDT[/color]- For modders to use to convert armour
[color=#00ffff]SMWO Ultimate Cleavage HDT [/color] - Same as Cleavage, only more [/font]windage and elevation!

[font=Comic Sans MS]ALL verions are now v2.0. The old v1.0 has been tweaked and reshaped and is now correctly termed as "Petite". The breasts are now more in line with the hips & waist. Still looks hot though!

You can switch between any of the following categories in which to produce the bodies/parts: 

[color=#00ff00]UUNP HDT 
UUNP Non Nude 
UUNP Non Nude HDT 
UUNP Special 
UUNP Feet 
UUNP Hands
UUNP Feet Special (HDT)
UUNP Hands Special (HDT) [/color][/font][/center]
[center][/center][center]Using the SMWO .xmls for creating armours couldn't be any easier. Especially when you use "Batch Build"; you can literally eliminate hours of work in Outfit Studio with this marvelous feature of BodySlide. So please, if you're new to BodySlide then head on over to the mod page and read some handy tutorials and tips! 

Vanilla gear is now available!
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74004/?]Spice Gear Collection and Minidresses HDT for SMWO[/url] 

Also:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75873/?]Ciri DLC Armour[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73971/?]DX Armours for SMWO[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73689/?]Seraphine Armour for SMWO[/url]

Go enjoy the fruits of my labour! 

[color=#ff7700][size=4]Installation[/size][/color]

Simply drop the file into the BodySlide folder. 

[color=#f1c232][size=4]Requirements for the bodies[/size][/color] 

(for HDT body and associated animations)
You will need a HDT skeleton such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XMPSE[/url] (see requirements for XPMSE).
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics and Extensions[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]FNIS[/url] (latest version)
The latest version of [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] is always strongly advised! 
For BBP/TBBP and files related to the "Special" version then [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72030/?]HDT Bounce & Jiggles UNP[/url] has all your bouncy jiggly needs. Literally. That's what DC uses!

[color=#ffff00][size=4]Q & A with DC

[/size][/color][color=#00ffff]Q.[/color] Eh? You released this before and the mods deleted it, what happened? 
[color=#00ff00]A.[/color] I misread the BodySlide permissions. Well, it was past 4am in the morning and I'd been working on the page, files and screenshots for 16 hrs. All sorted now though.

[color=#00ffff]Q.[/color] This isn't "athletic"! 
[color=#00ff00]A.[/color] And you've been around...how many athletic types for how many hours of the day or days of the week? Do you surf? Snowboard? Or do any extreme sport? Hmm? I've spent most of my life around these types whilst surfing/snowboarding, not to mention the lovers in my life.

[color=#00ffff]Q.[/color] But women aren't shaped like this! 
[color=#00ff00]A.[/color] Again...depends on what you've seen or taken notice of. People come in all shapes and sizes; there's no right or wrong. 

[color=#00ffff]Q.[/color] About Erin: can I have her preset? She's so beautiful! 
[color=#00ff00]A.[/color] No. 

[color=#00ffff]Q.[/color] Come on PLEASE?
[color=#00ff00]A.[/color] No means "NO"! Erin took me around 8 hrs to make and I didn't realise that I'd created a perfect likeness of my ex. I didn't share the original in real life, so I won't share Erin. Not now, not ever. So please don't ask because it won't happen. 

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#6aa84f][size=4]Mods used, and recommended for Erin & Meera [/size][/color][/font]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44938/?]Isharas Custom Player Body[/url] by IsharaMeradin

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69353/?]Dragon Eyes [/url] by NikiSlips
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35056/?]Facial Piercings V2[/url] by Regn
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13469/?]Piercing[/url] by newermind43
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64283/?]Immersive Jewelry [/url]by Forteverum
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35677/?]The Coenaculi - RaceMenu Plugin for Tattoos[/url] by Desufire 
NUHairstyles by Nana-Beats (LoversLab)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania[/url] by tetrodoxin
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/690/?]Freckles for females [/url]by realadry
[url=http://robton.nu/luxurious-seduction-mashup-unprt/]Raven's Luxurious Seduction Mashup for UNPRT[/url] by robton - original author is  Raven Reginleif

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72420/?]Pose Picker (Browser)[/url] by me (not actually "Me", but that's his/her name)

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00]E[/color][color=#00ff00]N[/color][color=#00ffff]B[/color]

[color=#1e84cc][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24828/?]Bleak & UnBleak ENB[/url] [/size][/color][size=2]by akiro[/size][/font]


[color=#ff7700][size=4][b]Credits & Spank You's![/b][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide and Outfit Studio[/url] by [font=Comic Sans MS]Ousnius and Caliente
(check out their page for handy tutorials!)

(for allowing me to distribute the textures used for the screenshots)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62099/?]Meera - Standalone Follower[/url] by Syphoid
(for letting me showcase Meera alongside Erin)

[/font][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][center][color=#ff0000][size=4]Permissions [/size][/color]

You may [u][i]NOT[/i][/u]: 
- upload my files anywhere else. I can do that on my own volition, I need no such assistance. If you want to put my files on a site then [i]ASK FOR MY PERMISSION[/i]. If I say "NO", then please respect that and understand what "NO" means.
- use my files as part of a mod that is NOT free for all to download and enjoy.

You [u][i]MAY[/i]:[/u]
- use my body replacer for a follower/armour mod. In fact, please DO! 

[size=2]Please read the permissions tab: I would like to see people using my presets and modding armour.
So, feel free to mod away! Mind you, check with me just in case I'm working on the same set. 
[/size]
[color=#38761d][size=3]And remember; No matter where you go, there you are. [/size][/color][/center][/font]
author: Dcypher75
